name: Rust
postCreateCommand: sudo bash -lc 'set -eux; export UV_INSTALL_DIR=/usr/local/bin UV_CACHE_DIR=/opt/uv-cache; if ! command -v uv >/dev/null 2>&1; then curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh; fi; uv --version; if ! UV_CACHE_DIR=${UV_CACHE_DIR} uv python find 3.13 >/dev/null 2>&1; then UV_CACHE_DIR=${UV_CACHE_DIR} uv python install 3.13; fi; ln -sf "$(UV_CACHE_DIR=${UV_CACHE_DIR} uv python find 3.13)" /usr/local/bin/python3.13; chown -R vscode:vscode ${UV_CACHE_DIR}'
